page.title: 09SUPERNATURAL
page.content: It is difficult to find any substantiated stories of the super- natural in Mortehoe. It is generally agreed that a lady born about a hundred years ago and still remembered by some residents had the power to "put a curse" on people who upset her, but the curses appear to have been short-lived. Yarde Farm, which is one of the oldest houses in the area, is reputed to be haunted and as recently as the 1950s when farms held Harvest Suppers for those who had helped gather the harvest the workers were always anxious to hurry away before moonrise. There is a "long room" at Yarde where, if small children are put to bed, they waken in the night in tears. The son of a resident remembers crying when he saw a vision of a "lady in grey", the ghost of a lady from a shipwreck at Bennet's Mouth.
